Text: John AdamsOctDear Mr Skilling John Adams has asked me to extend his appreciation for the invitation to attend the Oct energy policy conference in Washington DC Unfortunately Mr Adams has a previously scheduled board meeting and will be unable to participate As an alternate Mr Adams would like to suggest Ashok Gupta who is the Director of NRDCs Energy Program Please advise if it would be possible for Mr Gupta to attend in place of Mr Adams Thank you Sincerely Ann Roach Assistant to the President
